content: The twelve animals of the Chinese zodiac come from eleven kinds of animals originating in nature, namely the rat, ox, tiger, rabbit, snake, horse, goat, monkey, rooster, dog and pig, as well as the legendary form of the dragon, and are used as a calendar.
translations: ita:I dodici animali dello zodiaco cinese provengono da undici tipi di animali originari in natura, vale a dire il topo, il
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by eastasiastudent (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
